event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Software
event.name: Increment
event.description: Incremented only on writes to the Software Increment Register

event.title: Instruction Cache
event.name: Miss
event.description: L1 instruction cache refill

event.title: Data Cache
event.name: Miss
event.description: L1 data cache refill

event.title: Data Cache
event.name: Access
event.description: L1 data cache access

event.title: Data
event.name: Data Read
event.description: Data Read architecturally executed. This event occurs for every instruction that explicitly reads data, including SWP

event.title: Data
event.name: Data Write
event.description: Data Write architecturally executed. This event occurs for every instruction that explicitly writes data, including SWP

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Instruction Executed
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed

event.title: Exception
event.name: Taken
event.description: This event occurs on each exception taken

event.title: Exception
event.name: Return
event.description: Exception return architecturally executed. This event occurs on every exception return

event.title: Context ID
event.name: Change
event.description: Change to Context ID executed

event.title: Program Counter
event.name: SW change
event.description: Software changed the PC, except by an exception, architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Immediate executed
event.description: B immediate, BL immediate or BLX immediate instruction architecturally executed (taken or not taken)

event.title: Procedure
event.name: Returns
event.description: Procedure return architecturally executed, other than exception returns, for example, BZ Rm, LDM Rn, {..,PC}

event.title: Access
event.name: Unaligned
event.description: This event occurs for each instruction that was to an unaligned address that either triggered an alignment fault, or would have done so if the SCTLR A-bit had been set

event.title: Branch
event.name: Mispredicted
event.description: Branch mispredicted or not predicted

event.title: Branch
event.name: Predicted
event.description: Branches or other change in program flow that could have been predicted by the branch prediction resources of the processor

event.title: Access
event.name: Data access
event.description: Data memory access

event.title: Instruction Cache
event.name: Access
event.description: L1 instruction cache access

event.title: Bus
event.name: Access
event.description: AXIM, Flash or LLPP bus access

event.title: Memory Error
event.name: Error
event.description: Local memory error (instruction cache, data cache, ATCM, BTCM, CTCM or Flash)

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Speculatively Executed
event.description: Operation speculatively executed

event.title: Bus
event.name: Cycles
event.description: AXIM bus cycles

event.title: Chain
event.name: Counter chain increment
event.description: Even numbered counter overflow

event.title: Branch
event.name: Executed
event.description: Branch instruction executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Mispredicted, Executed
event.description: Mispredicted branch instruction executed

event.title: Stall
event.name: Front End
event.description: No operation issued due to the front end

event.title: Stall
event.name: Back End
event.description: No operation issued due to the back end

event.title: Bus
event.name: Read access
event.description: AXIM, Flash or LLPP bus read access

event.title: Bus
event.name: Write access
event.description: AXIM, Flash or LLPP bus write access

event.title: Exception
event.name: SVC call
event.description: Number of supervisor (SVC) exceptions taken

event.title: Exception
event.name: IRQ
event.description: Number of IRQ exceptions taken

event.title: Exception
event.name: FIQ
event.description: Number of FIQ exceptions taken

event.title: Exception
event.name: HVC
event.description: Number of hypervisor (HVC) exceptions taken

event.title: Exception
event.name: Trap IRQ
event.description: Number of IRQ exceptions not taken locally

event.title: Exception
event.name: Trap FIQ
event.description: Number of FIQ exceptions not taken locally

event.title: External Memory
event.name: AXI read
event.description: External memory request, AXIM read

event.title: External Memory
event.name: AXI write
event.description: External memory request, AXIM write

event.title: External Memory
event.name: Flash read
event.description: External memory request, Flash read

event.title: External Memory
event.name: LLPP read
event.description: External memory request, LLPP read

event.title: External Memory
event.name: LLPP write
event.description: External memory request, LLPP write

event.title: External Memory
event.name: Non-cacheable AXI read
event.description: Non-cacheable external memory request, AXIM read

event.title: External Memory
event.name: Non-cacheable AXI write
event.description: Non-cacheable external memory request, AXIM write

event.title: External Memory
event.name: Non-cacheable Flash read
event.description: Non-cacheable external memory request, Flash read

event.title: Data Cache
event.name: Miss (prefetch)
event.description: L1 data cache refill due to prefetch (AXIM only)

event.title: Data Cache
event.name: Miss (AXI Load/Store)
event.description: L1 data cache refill due to load or store (AXIM)

event.title: Data Cache
event.name: Miss (Flash Load/Store)
event.description: L1 data cache refill due to load or store (Flash)

event.title: Data Cache
event.name: Access (AXI)
event.description: L1 data cache access in a way reserved for AXIM

event.title: Data Cache
event.name: Access (Flash)
event.description: L1 data cache access in a way reserved for Flash

event.title: Instruction Cache
event.name: Access (AXI)
event.description: L1 instruction cache access in a way reserved for AXIM

event.title: Instruction Cache
event.name: Access (Flash)
event.description: L1 instruction cache access in a way reserved for Flash

event.title: External Memory
event.name: Non-cacheable AXI hinted read
event.description: Non-cacheable external memory request because of load was hinted, AXIM

event.title: External Memory
event.name: Non-cacheable Flash hinted read
event.description: Non-cacheable external memory request because of load was hinted, Flash

event.title: Instruction Cache
event.name: Miss (AXI)
event.description: L1 instruction cache refill (AXIM)

event.title: Instruction Cache
event.name: Miss (Flash)
event.description: L1 instruction cache refill (Flash)

event.title: External Memory
event.name: Non-cacheable AXI load
event.description: Non-cacheable external memory request due to load, AXIM read

event.title: External Memory
event.name: Non-cacheable Flash load
event.description: Non-cacheable external memory request due to load, Flash read

event.title: Branch
event.name: Conditional executed
event.description: Conditional branch instruction executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Conditional mispredicted
event.description: Conditional branch instruction mispredicted

event.title: Branch
event.name: BTAC executed
event.description: BTAC branch instruction executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: BTAC mispredicted
event.description: BTAC branch instruction mispredicted

event.title: VSCTLR
event.name: Change
event.description: MCR to VSCTLR

event.title: DSB
event.name: DSB ALL executed
event.description: Strong DSB (DSB ALL) executed

event.title: Contention
event.name: Simultaneous I/D access (AXI)
event.description: Simultaneous accesses from instruction side and data side to AXIM causing contention

event.title: Contention
event.name: Simultaneous I/D access (Flash)
event.description: Simultaneous accesses from instruction side and data side to Flash causing contention

event.title: Exception
event.name: EL2 entry
event.description: Number of exceptions taken to EL2 (hyp mode entry), excluding reset

event.title: Branch
event.name: CRS executed
event.description: CRS branch instruction executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: CRS mispredicted
event.description: CRS branch instruction mispredicted

event.title: Memory Error
event.name: Correctable
event.description: Correctable memory error occurred from any source (instruction cache, data cache, ATCM, BTCM, CTCM or Flash)

event.title: Memory Error
event.name: Fatal
event.description: Fatal memory error occurred from any source (instruction cache, data cache, ATCM, BTCM, CTCM or Flash)

event.title: Bus
event.name: Correctable Data Error
event.description: Correctable data payload bus error occurred from any source (AXIM or LLPP)

event.title: Bus
event.name: Fatal Error (Other)
event.description: Fatal non-protocol bus error occurred (payload errors, except data) from any source (AXIM, Flash or LLPP)

event.title: Bus
event.name: Fatal Error (Protocol)
event.description: Fatal protocol bus error occurred (LEN, ID, LAST, READY and interconnect protection errors) from any source (AXIM, Flash or LLPP)

event.title: DPU IQ
event.name: Empty (No Miss) Cycles
event.description: Counts every cycle that the DPU IQ is empty and that is not because of a recent instruction cache miss in any way

event.title: DPU IQ
event.name: Empty (AXI Miss) Cycles
event.description: Counts every cycle that the DPU IQ is empty and there is an instruction cache miss being processed for a cache way reserved for AXIM

event.title: DPU IQ
event.name: Empty (Flash Miss) Cycles
event.description: Counts every cycle that the DPU IQ is empty and there is an instruction cache miss being processed for a cache way reserved for Flash

event.title: Interlock
event.name: Other Cycles
event.description: Counts every cycle there is an interlock that is not because of an Advanced SIMD or floating-point instruction, and not because of a load/store instruction waiting for data to calculate the address in the AGU. Stall cycles because of a stall in Wr, typically awaiting load data, are excluded

event.title: Interlock
event.name: AGU Cycles
event.description: Counts every cycle there is an interlock that is because of a load/store instruction waiting for data to calculate the address in the AGU. Stall cycles because of a stall in Wr, typically awaiting load data, are excluded

event.title: Interlock
event.name: FP/ASIMD Cycles
event.description: Counts every cycle there is an interlock that is because of an Advanced SIMD or floating-point instruction. Stall cycles because of a stall in the Wr stage, typically waiting load data, are excluded

event.title: Stall
event.name: Load (AXI)
event.description: Counts every cycle there is a stall in the Wr stage because of a load miss from the AXIM

event.title: Stall
event.name: Load (Flash)
event.description: Counts every cycle there is a stall in the Wr stage because of a load miss from the Flash

event.title: Stall
event.name: Store
event.description: Counts every cycle there is a stall in the Wr stage because of a store

event.title: Stall
event.name: Store (AXI STB full)
event.description: Store stalled because the AXIM part of the store buffer was full

event.title: Stall
event.name: Store (TCM STB full)
event.description: Store stalled because the TCM part of the store buffer was full

event.title: Stall
event.name: Store (LLPP STB full)
event.description: Store stalled because the LLPP part of the store buffer was full

event.title: Stall
event.name: Barrier (Barrier)
event.description: Barrier stalled because store buffer was busy with another barrier

event.title: Stall
event.name: Barrier (AXI write)
event.description: Barrier stalled because it was waiting for a write to complete on the AXIM bus

event.title: Instruction Cache
event.name: Way Tracker Hit
event.description: L1 instruction cache way tracker hit

event.title: Data Cache
event.name: Way Tracker Hit
event.description: L1 data cache way tracker hit

event.title: MPU
event.name: Instruction Hit
event.description: Instruction side μ-MPU hit

event.title: MPU
event.name: Data Hit
event.description: Data side μ-MPU hit

event.title: Instruction Cache
event.name: Hit
event.description: L1 instruction cache hit

event.title: Instruction Cache
event.name: Linefill Buffer Hit
event.description: L1 instruction cache linefill buffer hit

event.title: Instruction Cache
event.name: BIU Hit
event.description: L1 instruction cache hit on BIU response

event.title: Instruction Cache
event.name: Hint Request
event.description: L1 instruction cache hint request sent
